name: Yoshin
description:
Yoshin is a short, simple, and semi-autobiographical narrative experience. The story follows a couple's daily interactions from opposite sides of the globe. In a way it's more short-film than game (and really just the start of one). I ended-up prioritizing aesthetic and an atmosphere much more than gameplay, but I hope you enjoy nonetheless! I got a little carried-away refining the menu, audio, and opening sequence, but I plan to finish-out the idea in the coming weeks, so stay posted!

Also, I'm proud to say that everything (except the fonts and about half of the audio) in this game was programmed, drawn, or mouth-recorded from scratch by yours-truly in GameMaker Studio 2!
